channel.title: Comments on: Visual Studio – MetalScroll Add-On
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description: I'm not sure, I've never tried adding an add-in for SSMS but I have to assume that at least some of the functionality would work if you could find a way to add it in.
item.content:encoded: I’m not sure, I’ve never tried adding an add-in for SSMS but I have to assume that at least some of the functionality would work if you could find a way to add it in.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
This looks interesting, thanks for posting this…will have to check it out

I wonder if it would work with SSMS for SQL
